description: This Java class defines a global exception handler using Spring Boot's @ControllerAdvice to handle specific exceptions and return standardized error responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring Boot controller advice that handles exceptions globally and provides custom error responses.

classes.name: ErrorBody
classes.description: A static inner class representing the structure of error response bodies, containing message, code, and style-related color fields.

methods.name: handleIllegalArgument
methods.description: Handles IllegalArgumentExceptions and returns a BAD_REQUEST response with an ErrorBody containing the exception message.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions by returning an INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR response with a generic error message.

methods.name: ErrorBody constructor
methods.description: Initializes the ErrorBody with the provided message and code.
